## Enumerations

### enum  {#ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum llvm::LegacyLegalizeActions::LegacyLegalizeAction : std::uint8&#95;t</>}>

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a2d949fba71eeb09f438bde429c97f73b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Legal">
The operation is expected to be selectable directly by the target, and no transformation is necessary
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a5449e96e0fbabdf17da10f550e73fef7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NarrowScalar">
The operation should be synthesized from multiple instructions acting on a narrower scalar base-type
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078af024bf463bed5cbd23fd03a1499b4b48" />
<EnumerationListItem name="WidenScalar">
The operation should be implemented in terms of a wider scalar base-type
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a4f494c23358a431c763a6dc593381c78" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FewerElements">
The (vector) operation should be implemented by splitting it into sub-vectors where the operation is legal
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a2c6b35e9cd746d28ac9625e5f1694539" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MoreElements">
The (vector) operation should be implemented by widening the input vector and ignoring the lanes added by doing so
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a031174d0f974cf1041a9cadb84f0dcbf" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Bitcast">
Perform the operation on a different, but equivalently sized type
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a70d6bbaf9c336f6503bed0cee8421b29" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Lower">
The operation itself must be expressed in terms of simpler actions on this target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078af57e86597132ffdc2f10aa179c8d522b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Libcall">
The operation should be implemented as a call to some kind of runtime support library
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a77dcc0b01e20bc9215e0ce22d81aca98" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Custom">
The target wants to do something special with this combination of operand and type
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078a5118e62994caf312467b5e5539a9e39b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Unsupported">
This operation is completely unsupported on the target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ad25716c86372dafbf624b34891685078aa2a0de09ad7131649f5caf2ca1093396" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NotFound">
Sentinel value for when no action was found in the specified table
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>
